name: Trek to Temoc
description:
Trek to Temoc is a halloween themed exploration game made for the HackUTD GameJam in a team of five computer science students. Explore this world of halloween wonders ranging from ghosts, pumpkins, and castles. Use the left and right arrows to move,  Z to Jump, X to attack, and C to dash. 

Assets used:

Ground Tiles & Main Character from Unity Asset Store
